Uses of Package
com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.controls

  • Packages that use com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.controls 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.controls
    Classes implementing Sun proprietary LDAP controls.
  • Classes in com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.controls used by com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.controls 
    Class Description
    AccountUsabilityRequestControl
    The Sun-defined account usability request control.
    AccountUsabilityResponseControl
    The Sun-defined account usability response control.
    AffinityControl
    Control that provides a value for affinity.
    RealAttributesOnlyRequestControl
    The Sun-defined real attributes only request control.
    TransactionIdControl
    Control to provide a transaction ID.
    VirtualAttributesOnlyRequestControl
    The Sun-defined virtual attributes only request control.
